item.title: ‘Ballad of a Small Player’ First Look: Colin Farrell Teams Up With ‘Conclave’ Director for Gambler Thriller, Netflix Sets October Release Dates
item.description: Colin Farrell plays a gambler on the run in director Edward Berger’s anticipated thriller, “Ballad of a Small Player.” Netflix has slated the film for a prime release: it opens in U.S. theaters on Oct
